description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Remote Access Connection Manager information disclosure vulnerability: CVE-2024-30039:

1. Apply the appropriate update package corresponding to your system build from the given links below. 
2. Restart your system after the updates are installed to ensure that changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses an information disclosure issue linked to a buffer over-read, which could provide unauthorized access to sensitive information. Ensure that your system is on one of the affected builds before applying the updates.
- The relevant KB Articles for these updates are KB5037788, KB5037771, KB5037770, and KB5037768, depending on your Windows version.
- Use the following links for downloading:
  - [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)
  - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
  - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
  - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that you have administrative privileges.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
